desc: クリティカル率を大幅にアップ

dictionary.lore: An axe that belonged to the evil Lord Magress. It was sent to Grand Gaia when the the war with the humans was lost. Its impressive power is said to shatter one's soul in a single attack. However, it was sealed away in a treasure vault for many years as it was just too powerful for humans to wield. The Magical Axe surfaced late in the great war with the gods.

name: 魔神斧ロード・マグレス

usage.name: 破壊斧デス=クリムゾン
